int main (int argc, char **argv)
 This program is designed to query the table 'LogDb' for the contents of the row that has the key equal to the web page supplied as the command line argument.

const char * usage

Function Documentation

int main ( int  argc,
char **  argv 
)

This program is designed to query the table 'LogDb' for the contents of the row that has the key equal to the web page supplied as the command line argument.

The 'LogDb' table is populated with the apache_log_load program.

    "  Queries the table 'LogDb' for all rows that start\n"
    "  with <row-prefix>.  If no column families are\n"
    "  specified, then all column families are returned.\n"
    "  Otherwise, just the column families specified by\n"
    "  the <cf> arguments are returned\n"
